title: Proximal operator
summary: In mathematical optimization, the proximal operator is an operator associated with a proper,[note 1] lower semi-continuous convex function f {\displaystyle f} from a Hilbert space X {\displaystyle {\mathcal {X}}} to [ − ∞ , + ∞ ] {\displaystyle [-\infty ,+\infty ]} , and is defined by: [1]
